body_html: In #1778 restarting the server seemed to cure error 30 for some users. Does base container that is used for pytorch also work fine (nvidia/cuda:8.0-devel-ubuntu16.04)? Because if you are getting error even on the simple cuda program, it can't be related to pytorch.
body_text: In #1778 restarting the server seemed to cure error 30 for some users. Does base container that is used for pytorch also work fine (nvidia/cuda:8.0-devel-ubuntu16.04)? Because if you are getting error even on the simple cuda program, it can't be related to pytorch.
body: In #1778 restarting the server seemed to cure error 30 for some users. Does base container that is used for pytorch also work fine (nvidia/cuda:8.0-devel-ubuntu16.04)? Because if you are getting error even on the simple cuda program, it can't be related to pytorch.
